title: (HELP PLEASE)cant get store to work tired everything please help
body:
hi guys been playing league for about 3 months and its great no problems what so ever..
 just the fact I cant access the store everytime I click the store tab it just shows PLEASE WAIT WHILE YOU ARE LOGGED INTO THE LEAGUE OF LEGENDS STORE for bout 10 secs then just a black screen can access on other pcs but not mine...
 and yes ive don't everything the forums have said. enable the TSL... and update abode air,,, update ie,,, updated java,, synced clock,, reinstalled twice,, done it all guys just really want a final fix as im starting to get frustrated....

 PLEASE HELP Thanks guys Aussiedon **_~~~~~~

replies.body:
I've not personally encountered an issue like this before, but there is an article on the Support site that might be worth checking out - [Store Error: Store Appears Blank, Black or Empty](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753044-Store-Error-Store-appears-blank-black-or-empty)

My guess is there is something with your PC's underlying settings that is messing with the way League gets to the store.  When you say it works on other PCS - are they also using the same internet connection (eg. someone else's PC in your family)?

Let me know how you go.

ive been though all the forums tried everything they say.
just wont load... and no its on different pc's with different ISP...
just wondering if theres maybe some software needed.... I never had pando media booster and it says to have it......

I'm inclined to agree here that there is something missing, but its hard to say what.  The suggestions in the article cover most common scenarios and it sounds like you've done a lot to try and get it working. You shouldn't need Pando anymore as that is no longer used by the client (we actually recommend people uninstall it these days), and even so that is a technology that affects patching, rather than the store itself.

I'd strongly suggest that as a next step you get in touch with player support (see support link at top of page) and open a ticket with them.  They'll be able to help you troubleshoot it further, and will  be able to go through relevant logs and PC settings.

Cheers
Mindstar
I can access store on other pcs. Just not my laptop. I'm gonna try another reinstall see if that works... Dunno what else to try..

Hey,

Couple of questions:

* It wasnt super clear from your post - are you able to access the store when using your League account on another PC?
* Has it always been like this, or is this a recent thing?

Cheers
Mindstar
